metadata.title: CVE-2024-31142 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Because of a logical error in XSA-407 (Branch Type Confusion), themitigation is not applied properly when it is intended to be used.XSA-434 (Speculative Return Stack Overflow) uses the sameinfrastructure, so is equally impacted.For more details, see:  https://xenbits.xen.org/xsa/advisory-407.html  https://xenbits.xen.org/xsa/advisory-434.html

criterions.comment: xen package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
